definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Shanghai Theater Academy is full of southern graceful and pleasant girls.
sentences.chinese: 上海戲劇學院的美女多是南派氣質，婉約可人。

sentences.english: Their personality bearing and the nobility of the character compels obedience naturally.
sentences.chinese: 他們的氣質舉止和高尚的性格讓人們自然而然地折服。

sentences.english: Inhalable particulate matters(IP)bring adverse influence on ambient air and human health.
sentences.chinese: 可吸入顆粒物嚴重影響空氣質量和人體健康。

sentences.english: From 2001 to 2004, the city ambient air quality of the north China had been improved evidently.
sentences.chinese: 2004年，北方大部份城市空氣質量有明顯改善。

sentences.english: The quality of air isn't clean as before. The river is becoming dirty.
sentences.chinese: 空氣質量不如以前那麼清新了，河流也變得很髒。

sentences.english: Xuancheng's unique landscape on the city of temperament.
sentences.chinese: 就宣城獨特的山水城市氣質。

sentences.english: Good appearance and manner, flexible and have strong affability .
sentences.chinese: 形象氣質較好，頭腦靈活，具有較強親和力。

sentences.english: The lowest Hofstede Dimension for the Netherlands is Masculinity (MAS) at 14.
sentences.chinese: 最低得分的一個維度是男性氣質取向，14。

sentences.english: Do you think Gigi is a classy girl?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲梁詠琪很有氣質？

sentences.english: The rationalist finally will be of dogmatic temper in his affirmations .
sentences.chinese: 最後，理性主義者在斷言時總帶些武斷性的氣質。

sentences.english: He was a romantic who went off to the South Seas to paint pictures.
sentences.chinese: 他遠赴南海去繪畫，是個富有浪漫氣質的人。

sentences.english: Zuo Jin's style of humor has also served him well in his career as a cartoonist.
sentences.chinese: 左晉的幽默氣質，更好地用在了他的動漫事業上。

sentences.english: Personal accomplishment decided the qualities of a person.
sentences.chinese: 個人修養決定了一個人的氣質。

sentences.english: The city's weather bureau gave air quality a rare hazardous ranking.
sentences.chinese: 城市氣象局給了今天的空氣質量一個罕見的危險排名。

sentences.english: Culture and refinement are not always concomitants of wealth.
sentences.chinese: 有財富未必就能有文雅氣質。

sentences.english: Lisha is green and junior, sex appeal is attractive, taking mysterious temperament.
sentences.chinese: 麗莎青春年少，性感迷人，帶着神祕的氣質。

definition: to stand out from the masses (idiom)
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
